actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1279.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order and providing certain procedures during consideration of the bill H.R. 12932 making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1979, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12932 (Appropriations for the Department of the Interior).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order and providing certain procedures during consideration of the bill H.R. 12932 making appropriations for the Department of the Interior and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1979, and for other purposes.
